mapper.sql: a.xwi_office_name AS "xwiOfficeName", a.xwi_user_profession AS "xwiUserProfession", a.xwi_user_name AS "xwiUserName", a.xwi_winning_name AS "xwiWinningName", a.xwi_winning_years AS "xwiWinningYears", a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.xwi_proj_id AS "xwiProjId", a.xwi_proj_name AS "xwiProjName", a.xwi_office_id AS "xwiOfficeId", a.xwi_user_id AS "xwiUserId", a.xwi_user_grade AS "xwiUserGrade", a.xwi_user_stuno AS "xwiUserStuno", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.xwi_status AS "xwiStatus", a.xwi_college_comment AS "xwiCollegeComment", a.xwi_manage_comment AS "xwiManageComment", a.xwi_college_standby AS "xwiCollegeStandby", a.xwi_manage_standby AS "xwiManageStandby", a.xwi_winning_level AS "xwiWinningLevel", a.xwi_winning_content AS "xwiWinningContent"
LEFT JOIN sys_office xwiOfficeName ON xwiOfficeName.id = a.xwi_office_name
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xmu_winning_info( xwi_office_name, xwi_user_profession, xwi_user_name, xwi_winning_name, xwi_winning_years, id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, xwi_proj_id, xwi_proj_name, xwi_office_id, xwi_user_id, xwi_user_grade, xwi_user_stuno, proc_ins_id, xwi_status, xwi_college_comment, xwi_manage_comment, xwi_college_standby, xwi_manage_standby, xwi_winning_level, xwi_winning_content ) VALUES ( #{xwiOfficeName}, #{xwiUserProfession}, #{xwiUserName}, #{xwiWinningName}, #{xwiWinningYears}, #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{xwiProjId}, #{xwiProjName}, #{xwiOfficeId}, #{xwiUserId}, #{xwiUserGrade}, #{xwiUserStuno}, #{procInsId}, #{xwiStatus}, #{xwiCollegeComment}, #{xwiManageComment}, #{xwiCollegeStandby}, #{xwiManageStandby}, #{xwiWinningLevel}, #{xwiWinningContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xmu_winning_info SET xwi_office_name = #{xwiOfficeName}, xwi_user_profession = #{xwiUserProfession}, xwi_user_name = #{xwiUserName}, xwi_winning_name = #{xwiWinningName}, xwi_winning_years = #{xwiWinningYears}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, xwi_proj_id = #{xwiProjId}, xwi_proj_name = #{xwiProjName}, xwi_office_id = #{xwiOfficeId}, xwi_user_id = #{xwiUserId}, xwi_user_grade = #{xwiUserGrade}, xwi_user_stuno = #{xwiUserStuno}, xwi_status = #{xwiStatus}, xwi_winning_level = #{xwiWinningLevel}, xwi_winning_content = #{xwiWinningContent} WHERE id = #{id}
